alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lowndes; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 03 at 10:01AM CST until March 03 at 10:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Noxubee County in east central Mississippi... Central Kemper County in east central Mississippi... Lowndes County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 1045 AM CST. * At 1000 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Kolola Springs to Deerbrook to near Bluff Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Columbus AFB, Caledonia, Deerbrook, Kolola Springs and Steens around 1005 AM CST. Prairie Point around 1010 AM CST. Bigbee Valley around 1015 AM CST. Electric Mills and Porterville around 1025 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Shuqualak and Scooba. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
